writer.name: 罗伯特·莫里斯克 Robert Moresco

this_title: The Black Donnellys: The World Will Break Your Heart
introduction: Tommy is plagued with guilt when Kate (Molly Schaffer), widow of Irish-mob kingpin Huey, asks him to host her slain husband's wake. Meanwhile, Kevin and Joey go on a quest to find booze for the wake; Huey's brother (Peter Greene) begins to suspect that drug-addled Jimmy may be his sibling's killer. Meanwhile, Jimmy puts himself and his brothers in a bad situation when, while under drugs, he appears to pay his respects to Huey's brother, Dokey.
chinese_title: The Black Donnellys: The World Will Break Your Heart
